방어구 상인 헬무트:
Heave...Ho! Whuh? A customer! Oh, I'm in the middle of moving loads...
So, you need armor? Well, have a look around and see if there's something you want! We used to have a lot of good items, but nowadays...well, with the northern regions so troubled, getting genuine Dwarven-made items is like plucking a star from the sky. Too bad...
